## Introduction

In this lecture, I will show you how to generate quarto document

## `ggplot2` output

@fig-scatterplot-airquality shows the relationship between Ozone with Temp.

```{r}
#| results: asis
#| eval: true
#| warning: false
#| fig-height: 1.5
#| fig-cap: "Loess of airquality"
#| label: fig-scatterplot-airquality
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(airquality, aes(Temp, Ozone)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", se = FALSE)
```
